features: Rack Up the Savings: Stop wasting money on toilet paper or wipes that can clog your toilet and not being very hygienic in the process. Our handheld bidet faucet sprayer set delivers an effective and refreshing cleanse for optimal personal hygiene

Multi Purpose Bidet Faucet Sprayer Set: Our toilet bidet faucet sprayer kit has many uses. Aside from personal hygiene, our hand held bidet faucet sprayer can also be used for cleaning cloth diapers, pet grooming, bathroom clean-up, and postpartum care

Adjustable Water Flow: Our toilet handheld bidet faucet sprayer comes with a customizable flow feature that allows you to modify the water pressure according to use. You can go from a soft spray for intimate care to a jet blast to conquer stubborn stains

Easy, No Fuss Installation: With our handheld bidet faucet sprayer for toilet, you won’t need specialized tools or pay a plumber for installation. The kit comes with all the parts you need along with detailed instructions for an easy, DIY installation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 CLEAN 2 SUSTAINABLE 3 VERSATILE 4 COMFORTABLE 5 EASY TO USE

Previous page Turn Off Water This is typically done by turning a valve that's located on the wall near your toilet. Install T-Valve Simply screw the t-valve under the toilet tank by turning it counterclockwise. Connect water supply Connect the water supply line back to the lower part of the t-valve Attach bidet hose Attach the hexagonal nut to the t-valve and the conical part of the hose to the sprayer head. Install Holder Install the bidet holder to either the wall using the anchors & screws or to the toilet tank. Next page HOW TO INSTALL YOUR NEW PURRFECTZONE TOILET BIDET SPRAYER 1 TURN OFF WATER 2 INSTALL T-VALVE 3 CONNECT WATER SUPPLY 4 ATTACH BIDET HOSE 5 INSTALL HOLDER

How's the water pressure of this bidet sprayer? The sprayer offers a range of pressure, from a gentle rinse to a strong spray, that can be adjusted for comfort Can I install the bidet sprayer on my own? Yes, our customers found the installation process straightforward with clear instructions. However, if you have any difficulties, consider getting assistance. How can I prevent my sprayer from leaking? To prevent leaks, always ensure that all connections are properly tightened and secured. It's recommended to switch off the water flow when the sprayer is not in use. If you are experiencing issues with your new nozzle, please reach out to us. How does this sprayer maintain hygiene even in a shared bathroom? Absolutely, the design ensures minimal contact with the sprayed water, maintaining hygiene. Just like other bathroom fixtures, we recommend cleaning the sprayer regularly for optimal sanitary conditions. Does the sprayer require any regular maintenance? The sprayer requires minimal maintenance. We recommend regularly checking the connections for tightness and cleaning the nozzle to prevent mineral buildup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Hygiene Game-Changer!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Purrfectzone Luxury Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, and it has truly revolutionized my daily routine. This handheld bidet sprayer exudes premium quality with its stainless steel body and precision fittings. The leak-proof stainless steel braided hose ensures durability, promising years of efficient and hygienic use.One of the standout features of this bidet sprayer set is its adjustable water flow, allowing for a customizable cleanse tailored to your preference. Whether you're looking for a gentle spray for intimate care or a powerful blast to tackle stubborn stains, this bidet sprayer delivers with ease. The multi-purpose design adds versatility to its functionality, making it not just a personal hygiene tool but also handy for tasks like cleaning cloth diapers, pet grooming, bathroom clean-up, and postpartum care.The installation process was a breeze, thanks to the comprehensive kit that includes all the necessary parts and detailed instructions. Say goodbye to the hassle of specialized tools or the need for a plumber – the Purrfectzone bidet sprayer lets you enjoy the benefits of elevated hygiene with a simple and fuss-free DIY installation. In a world where hygiene matters more than ever, this bidet sprayer has become an indispensable addition to my bathroom, and I wholeheartedly give it a well-deserved five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Personal Hygiene!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Bidet Sprayer for toiletry for home use, and it has been a total game-changer in the hygiene department! The installation was a breeze, and the quality of the product is impressive.The spray power is just right, providing a refreshing and thorough cleaning experience. I appreciate the simplicity of the design, making it easy to use for everyone in the family. The build is sturdy and feels durable, ensuring long-term reliability.My only wish is that it had a temperature control option. It's already fantastic, but being able to adjust the water temperature would take the experience to the next level, especially during those chilly mornings.Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase, and the bidet sprayer has become an essential part of our daily routine. If you're looking to upgrade your bathroom hygiene game, this is definitely worth considering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent bidet shower
reviews.reviewText: I got the shower well packaged. Easy to install, however the piece was defective and had a slow leak at the handle. I reached out to the seller and they were prompt to respond and replace. The new piece is working perfectly fine. Great customer service and a decent product. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helpful after having baby
reviews.reviewText: It was a cold winter in Los Angeles and after being sent home with my baby and having stitches that cold water was what I needed. This saved me from having to use that peri bottle. Wait I actually did use it for a day or two before installing this. The bottle was too much of a thing. This is the way to go i reccomend this to any lady. It was easy to install. Though after 9 months the part that hold the hose is getting a bit rusty from the condensation of the tank. But I can take steel wool to it. Remembering to shut the valve off at first took some getting used to but because Im fearful of a leak and water all over the floor I've made it a point to shut off the valve. It stury feeling and not cheaply made. I used it to blast away spit up and food from my baby's clothes,since the tub is right next to the toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh you don't bidet? Well I bido!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bidet sprayer for my bathroom and I'm so glad I did. It was easy to install, works great and looks sleek. It has a nice pressure and spray pattern that makes cleaning a breeze. I feel so fresh and hygienic after using it. It also saves me money on toilet paper and reduces waste. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to upgrade their bathroom experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure not to cross thread!!
reviews.reviewText: The product and instructions were great. For my toilet, there was little room to maneuver so that took a bit of swearing and a few redos. I think if I have to replace it I would attach everything together and then to the bottom of the toilet tank. It worked much easier when I had to redo that fitting due to leaking from cross threading. Also, the included tape is very thin and does not lend itself well to wrapping in the tight spaces. I used some I had on hand. Works fine so far and no leaks. It is cold!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought 3 of these for our old house and they were great. We just bought three more for our new house. They are really easy to install and they include everything you need to install them. I would highly recommend them to anyone. Our first purchase was over a year ago and they worked perfectly and held up great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great. Built well.
reviews.reviewText: Super easy install with all the parts and washers for any standard toilet. Easily mounts to wall or just hang it on the toilet. Have installed them in every bathroom. Highly recommend. I also purchased an extra shut off valve which I attached right at the sprayer so I can turn the water on and off after each use. They don't recommend leaving it on all the time but I don't know what would happen if you just left it on. You could install it by hand really but a wrench could be used if your hands are weak.
Good one, it was easy to install and quality is really good. Also bought the insurance in case it breaks down, covers me for 2 years.
Simple un producto de alta calidad. Instalación muy fácil y simple. No hay ni goteos ni fallas. Pensando en comprar uno adicional.
the tap doesn't fit Australian standard sizes

The media could not be loaded. This bad boy is cool, I like the hose and it was easy for my husband to install and it fits well and everything went no problem. The only thing is the pressure is really really high! It is sort of based on how hard you squeeze but there isn't a lot of in between. Just cold and FAST

reviews.reviewTitle: el gancho para sujetar la boquilla no se adaptó a mi tanque de wc
reviews.reviewText: la orilla del tanque tiene que ser lisa por dentro y por fuera para recibir al gancho que esta completamente recto
